Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nereida Aparthotel in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (Port des Torrent), you'll be convenient to Pinet Beach. This family-friendly aparthotel is within close proximity of Port des Torrent Beach and Sunset Strip.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 136 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the aparthotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the aparthotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is Noon
